unnormalised: Understanding state budgets is crucial for informed citizenry. Take Kerala's budget for instance; analyzing its allocation towards education & healthcare reveals much about development priorities. Onam celebrations might be impacted by fiscal policies. Rs. 500 Cr allocated here or there matters. How many kms of roads will be built? It is like dissecting biryani to see each ingredient! The CAG reports are essential reading too. Focus on FY 2023-24.
normalised: Understanding state budgets is crucial for informed citizenry. Take Kerala's budget for instance; analyzing its allocation towards education and healthcare reveals much about development priorities. Onam celebrations might be impacted by fiscal policies. Rupees five hundred crore allocated here or there matters. How many kilometers of roads will be built? It is like dissecting biryani to see each ingredient! The C A G reports are essential reading too. Focus on fiscal year two thousand twenty three to twenty four.
